#summary Details about the RCShield arm version

== Overview ==

RCShield is a contraction for R(emote) C(ontrol) Shield.<br>
<a href="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/RCShield-arm.png">
<img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/RCShield-arm.png" width="600"><a>

==Features==
 * Comes as 2 boards to allow various [RCShieldOptions configurations]
  * From 1 to 5 analog channels
  * Or 4 analog channels and one rotary encoder
 * XBee connector to allow any XBee solution.
 * I2C connector to connect a magnetometer or a GPS, available on both sides. 
 * GPS connector
 * All digital ports are replicated
 * Micro USB port with reinforcement
 * Digital switches
  * Automatically connect Serial2 to the arduino on the programming port
  * Allow the arduino plugged on the shield to read from the local XBee and program the XBee of the Remotuino
<br>
